messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the number of attacks per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Ithaqua grabs a target?
The target is automatically held
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the damage Ithaqua deals?
The damage is in the lift and drop‐1D10 x 10 feet.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage bonus does Ithaqua deal when fighting 80% of his STR?
He gets a damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where does Ithaqua's region of imprisonment supposedly be?
The Arctic north
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cause of the cry of the Wendigo, according to the text?
The anguish of the imprisoned god, combining the hatred of his binding and a jealousy for those living things able to crawl where they will upon the Earth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage is dealt per 10 feet dropped?
1D6 damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage bonus for fighting 80% damage?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of the Wendigo cry in the text?
The cry of the Wendigo is said to be the anguish of the imprisoned god, combining the hatred of his binding and a jealousy for those living things able to crawl where they will upon the Earth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the penalty for seeing Ithaqua?
1D10/1D100 Sanity points to see Ithaqua.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the appearance of Ithaqua?
He has no face, and is twice as tall as a man.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is special about Ithaqua's armor?
Wind Gust 100% (50/20), special (see above)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical form of the King in Yellow?
The King in Yellow might be human-seeming, clad in tattered yellow or particolored rags
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the horrible pseudopods of the King in Yellow?
The pseudopods can attach to a target and drain the very life from them (POW)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can change in the King in Yellow?
The being possesses a loathsome plasticity of shape, able to stretch and change at will
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the most frequently encountered avatar of Hastur the Unnameable?
The most frequently encountered avatar of Hastur the Unnameable is the King in Yellow
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the plasticity of the being's shape do?
It can stretch and change at will.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the Yellow Sign on those who see it?
It helps to warp the dreams of those who see it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Yellow Sign often embossed or stamped on?
editions of the evil book
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Yellow Sign a focus for?
madness
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the book the Yellow Sign is associated with?
The King in Yellow
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Avatar of Hastur in the King in Yellow?
Lord of Carcosa, Master of the Yellow Sign, Avatar of Hastur
